Reviews.Title: “A quiet retreat on the Lido within easy reach of the other Venice islands”
Reviews.Author: SheilaLaurence
Reviews.Content: looking clean value money hotel easy reach main islands venice hustle bustle palace hotel disappoint greeted friendly smile useful information ground floor easy access price extremely reasonable werent expecting view main lagoon looked onto canal hotel quiet comfortable breakfast buffet style plenty choice hot cold food restaurant outside warmer mornings looked lagoon dinner isnt served hotel plenty eat lido prices vary look menus outside venturing hotel short walk alilaguna waterbus terminal water main islands venice quickly youre getting aboard routes looking return palace hotel enjoyed chance discover
